attributes.action: Call for fireworks to be silent in order to prevent anxiety for animals.
attributes.additional_details: We want Parliament to create a new law to bring in the use of silent fireworks.
attributes.background: We would like parliament to debate this issue in order to make a law to make all fireworks silent. This is an important issue as it does create a lot of anxiety around November 5 and New Year's Eve.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Review and reduce the decibel limit on fireworks sold to the public: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/549758

Ban the use of all fireworks in order to reduce air and noise pollution: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/334448

While some fireworks are marketed as silent, these still make some noise. If you would like the Government to reduce the decibel limit to a specific level, you could start a new petition requesting this.
